Modules

Find something new to play.

From grim-dark sci-fi to the dusty saloons of the Old West, these game modules should have something for everybody, and if you have an idea for one of your own why not create one.

Dark Millenium: Shadow War

Skirmish Warfare in the Dark Millenium

Dark Millenium: Shadow War takes the combat of Dark Millenium into smaller, more intense battles, featuring a small number of infantry scale models per player.

Dark Millenium: Shadow War

Devils' Bluff

A Wild West Skirmish game in the lawless town of Devil's Bluff

Welcome to the town of Devil’s Bluff: a lawless place where anything goes and danger walks hand-in-hand with opportunity. In this fast-paced skirmish game, you’ll put together a gang of gunslingers, battle for dominance, wealth, and power, as you build your Wild West legend.

Devils' Bluff

Guilds and Glory

A Wild West Skirmish game in the lawless town of Devil's Bluff

Guilds and Glory

Halo Firefight

A Wild West Skirmish game in the lawless town of Devil's Bluff

Halo Firefight

Realms of Arcanis: Legions

A Wild West Skirmish game in the lawless town of Devil's Bluff

  • Despoiler Hordes

  • Saurian Empire

  • The Undead

  • Wood Elves

Realms of Arcanis: Legions

Scraplands Showdown

Vehicular Combat Racing in a post-apocalyptic wasteland

Scraplands Showdown is a post-apocalyptic vehicle racing and combat game. Each player assembles a team of vehicles, customised with upgrades, weapons, and armour, and competes to out-race and out-fight their opponents in a brutal Showdown.

Scraplands Showdown

Squadrons

A space combat game featuring fighter scale ships.

Squadrons is a game of space combat between small fighter or bomber scale ships. Each player commands a squadron of around 5 to 15 ships, performing high speed manoeuvres as they try to take down their opponents ships.

Squadrons
